text: John Ericson (sometimes spelled Erickson; September 25, 1926 - May 3, 2020) was a German-American movie and television actor. He was known for his roles in Pretty Boy Floyd (1960), Under Ten Flags (1960), Slave Queen of Babylon (1963), 7 Faces of Dr. Lao (1964), Operation Atlantis (1965), The Money Jungle (1968), The Bamboo Saucer (1968), Bedknobs and Broomsticks (1971), Crash! (1977), and The Far Side of Jericho (2006). Ericson died of pneumonia in Santa Fe, New Mexico on May 3, 2020 at the age of 93. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1926 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Actors from North Rhine-Westphalia Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:German movie actors Category:German television actors Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Entertainers from DÃ¼sseldorf
title: John Ericson
